text: I’m writing in regarding of your security officer in this Jurong island 31 Sakra Avenue. Your officers in duty is having a very bad attitude and bad behaviour. I had speak to the Mitsibushi chemical in charge of the security officer but he end up can’t even handle the situation properly and no action had been taken on this unacceptable behaviour and attitude. Why must all contractors need to accept this unreasonable bad attitude ( shouting and yelling) so I had a quarrel with this prospect security lady officer because of her attitude, please do not bring your bad behaviour and attitude on duty, location happened at 31 Sakra avenue guard house on 27/05/2024 @ 1030am. I hope this your good reputation company will give me a fair and polite apologise. Kindly take it seriously on this issue. It bring a very bad name to prospect security company and your lucite( Mitsibushi chemical company too. Please take necessary action on your security officer. And update me with what action your company had taken on this issue. Thank you.
